message: This is probably the most interesting web/networking platform around - the problem is that Erlang's concepts are damn strange.
story: Dody Gunawinata shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Chicago Boss: The Erlang Web Framework
caption: chicagoboss.org
description: APIWikiQuick StartDownload v 0.8.7 AboutBuild your next website with Erlang — the world’s most advanced networking platform.Do you pine for a simpler time when web pages loaded in under one second?
